title: Heat causes expansion
creator_credit: Gateway Film Productions and W. Hugh Baddeley
brief_description: Shows two children carrying out experiments in their home to prove that solids, liquids and gases expand when heated. Also shows many ways in which this law of physics occurs in everyday life. Suitable for upper secondary level.
